entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
